name: All the Way Gnome
description:
Goal: get the Gnome all the way home. 
Simple to play, family friendly game. 

Stay on the path, collect the coins, mushrooms, lucky clovers. Avoid/shoot/jump over the trash. Run into the hourglasses and slime ball icons to collect more time more slime balls. 

Keyboard controls: use arrow keys to move: <=left, >=right, ^ =jump, space=shoot. 
Phone controls: tap on the left side of screen to move left, tap on the right side of the screen to move right. Tap either up arrow to jump and either blast button to shoot slime balls. 

Collect gems and gifts to earn shields and slime ball packs. 

 (hint: the signs are important)
